URL shortening and link management platf: Acortamiento de URL y plataforma de gestión de enlaces con analítica.
\n To get your Access Token:\n 1. Log:
To get your Access Token:
  1. Log in to your Bitly account.
  2. Click your profile icon in the top right corner.
  3. Go to **Profile Settings**.
  4. Navigate to the **Developer settings** section.
  5. Click on **API**.
  6. Click the **Generate token** button and enter your password to get your access token.
